nodes.text: The Coyerti species was one of many life forms native to the planet Coyerti.

The Coyerti were extremely resistant to Imperial occupation, and held their own against the stronger force for a long time. However, due to their complex biology they were rendered extremely vulnerable during their mating season, a weakness the Imperials were sure to exploit. In preparation for this, the Coyerti resistance contacted the Rebel Alliance to request aid, and the 61st Mobile Infantry was sent. The Sixty-First, also known as Twilight Company, succeeded in destroying the Imperial biotoxin facilities and defending the Coyerti through their mating season.
The Coyerti species first appeared in the 2015 canon novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
